subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3228, how did it go?

Adjunto fotos de envío con un paquete q si entregaron y el otro paquete q
nunca llego

El vie., 12 de diciembre de 2025 4:00 p. m., service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> escribió:

> Hi Maximiliano Puecher
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you
> a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8099?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
> View ticket
> <https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8099?follow=email>
> *If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address
> bar: *https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8099?follow=email
>
> Regards,
> simsonn Support Team
>
> 8099:4206036
>
Hi Maximiliano Puecher,     I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Both packages were shipped together—did they not arrive at the same time? We'll look into it for you, don't worry.

Hola acabo de comunicarme con UPS por el envío q todavía no a llegado y me dice que utds tienen q hacer el reclamo  Le dejo el número de envío  1z01e9e16700534949 y por favor a la brevedad necesito solucionar este problema
